name: AreYouPsychic
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zener cards
des:
Are You Psychic? Test your extra sensory perception (ESP), primarily clairvoyance with the Zener Card Psychic Test, or use regularly to develop your psychic and clairvoyant skills. 

Once you launch the Zener Card Psychic Test, you’ll be greeted by parapsychologist Dr. Clair Voyant, who will be your coach and will offer you tips to keep you focused. Zener cards are presented in various two to five card spreads. 

Your challenge is to quickly predict what symbol the hidden card is; square, circle, star, waves, or cross. Once you state your answer, Dr. Clair will reveal the card and award you points. After you play five consecutive spreads, you’ll receive a score. Dr. Clair will also keep track of your High Score inspiring you to exceed it!

If you are dedicated to developing your ESP and clairvoyance, try these pro tips:

1. If you’re playing on an Amazon Dot device without a screen, grab a few index cards and sketch out the symbols; star, waves, cross, circle and square. This will help you quickly predict what the hidden Zener card is. 
2. Take a few moments to relax and clear your mind before selecting a shape to increase your ability to concentrate. 
3. Study each symbol to get a feeling about the symbol. Can you see the next shape in your mind’s eye? Or maybe the word of the symbol pops into your head. 
The odds of guessing a card by chance is 1 in 5. For a thorough assessment of psychic ability, one should take the test at least 10 times for conclusive results.

Any time you need a little help within the skill, just say “Help” for guidance.

Amazon Echo Dot is good for voice only participation. Echo Show devices with LCD screens takes you beyond the voice only experience where you can visually interact with Dr. Clair Voyant and enjoy beautiful graphics.

WHAT’S COMING SOON
In the coming weeks, you’ll be able to access a more challenging phase of Zener Card Psychic Testing through subscription. You will also have the option to set-up reminders to end or start the day with the ” Zener Card Psychic Test” skill every day, for example at 8:00 PM or breakfast time..


NOTE: The information in this skill is provided for entertainment purposes only.

FEEDBACK
